short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Everything you need to start your search! This extension sets Yahoo Search Springboard as your homepage, new tab, & search engine.
short.zh_TW: 打開瀏覽器閱讀每日頭條新聞! 此附加元件會自動將 tw.yahoo.com 設定為您的首頁及新分頁預設頁面.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start your search with everything you need in one place with Yahoo Search Springboard! You’ll find local weather, breaking news, trending topics, your daily horoscope, and more at your fingertips when you set Yahoo Search Springboard as your default search.  Install the free extension and enjoy the following upgrades: 

- Inspiring rotating background
- Search bar powered by Yahoo Search
- Trending search keywords
- Daily horoscope
- Content stream
- Local weather 

Yahoo Search Springboard includes customizations that make each search experience your own. The above features are all available in ‘Discover’ mode, however you can  toggle to ‘Minimum’ mode for a sleeker look. 

This extension will set search.yahoo.com as your default search.
